reviews.text: Visited this place 3 times while in Glasgow and can’t wait to go back. Entirely vegan menu and gluten free options also available. The vegan mince and tatties is a must. Great selection of beverages. Place can get very busy so try booking in advance. Super friendly staff.

What's not to like about Stereo? Great atmosphere and good surroundings. Can get quite busy at the weekends so can be difficult to find a seat but when you can it's really nice to chill here with your friends. 

They also serve food. It's a vegan bar / restaurant and the food is surprisingly good. It's impressive what they can make with vegan ingredients and the best thing is that it's guilt free!

Amazing food, friendly and helpful staff and a really relaxed and not too formal atmosphere.  Recommend for lunch, dinner and drinks! Actually... Don't go! Or I won't be able to get a table next time!!
Instant bloom was excellent. The bar staff was second to none. Keep it up 👆 ☺
Great Place! Good selection of Beers and Ales. Food Looks Good as well. *5

The food was extraordinary. Absolutely delicious. Alcohol is also served. Great list of wines and beer. The service is prompt. Very clean and one of the most amazing views in Alexandria. Takes you back in time where traces of cosmopolitan Alexandria are more than just obvious. The decoration is fantastic. Prices are high, but you get what you pay for.

Would never hesitate to rate this restaurant as "perfect" and give it 10 stars
The staff are super nice, food is yummy and the venue is cosy
Expensive but deserves each pound
Highly recommended
Perfect place for lunch and dinner.
Great place for shisha
Very good decorations and food, yet it's a before sunset restaurant. It's problem is about the lack of variety in hot drinks and it's extremely high prices.

Best sushi in Edmonton! 
Every time I go here is always a great experience, whether it's by myself or with friends and family.
The sushi and sashimi dishes are always super fresh and tasty.
Dining in the private rooms is really cool.
The staff are very friendly and attentive.
Excellent service. Nice menu. Probably the best Japanese food in town. I didn't love the tuna tataki or it would have been a five star evening.

Without the segregated rooms just sitting at a table it loses some of its charm. The server seem to be more interested in getting me to pay the bill then offering anything else at the end of the meal. That may have been a language thing however the preparation of the food was still First Rate and the portions incredibly generous

Had a friends surprise birthday on April 1 at Mikados. I wasn’t to pleased with how the service works honestly. We had one waitress for 20 people it was abit chaotic and unorganized. The server Karissa could have been more friendly I didn’t find her to be very polite or engaging to anyone. I’m not saying you have to go out of your way to socialize but at least maybe smile. She didn’t seem thrilled to be serving our table. I also don’t understand why they take your order without asking your name so they remember what dishes you ordered. Then they come back not knowing who ordered what and just shout out the dish I don’t think that’s really appropriate it makes it more busy and loud when there is already a lot of people in this room. Between me and my girlfriend we ordered the wild salmon sashimi which I found was fresh but we also ordered three different rolls and I found some of the raw fish to be warm on top and it didn’t seem as appetizing since it should be cold. Overall I feel like Mikado could improve on their service and also the quality of the food that’s being served. I was especially upset about the service since we are paying an automatic gratuity towards the server which I think can be improved for bigger parties.
Nice quiet atmosphere. Waitress was cute and very polite. Food was great! Will definately come back.
Very attentive staff, situated close to some great restaurants and shops to explore. Amazing views.
A beautiful town to stop in. We eat at Hotel Le Cheval and despite the volume of visitors the food was excellent. We will certainly go back there again.

I know this is a 3 Star hotel but the location and the staff make it a 5 Star! You can’t beat where it is!!! Also, my view out the window was great, my room was adequate size and cleaned daily. Parking is tricky but you can walk to everything!
Friendly staff, though worn out very small rooms. Nice location.

“Deluxe room “
Room was tiny.
No carpets in rooms (cheap laminate) so very noisy from above and next door.
Very strong smell of cheap air freshener greets you (what are they trying to hide?)
Saggy flat pack wardrobe containing “safe”!
Minus 4 outside but radiator stone cold.
No air conditioning 
Bathroom has a cheap plastic shower which has very poor pressure and head does not adjust, two very small towels.
“Parking” is the municipal car park a few hundred metres away, pitch dark and clearly not at all secure.
Overall impression is of a low rate flop house and they charged 160 euros!!!
Shame on you best western for blatant misrepresentation.....
AVOID AT ALL COSTS!!!
